name: NP_REL_ORDER_INFO
description: This table extracts the related group of items ORD 705-707. These items contain the next pass release user ID, instant, and workstation ID from a multistep order transmittal rule.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NP_RELEASE_USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the user who initiated the next pass through an order rule for generating tasks

columns.name: NP_RELEASE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: NP_RELEASE_INS_DTTM
columns.description: This date stamp indicates the time a rule (order transmittal rule) was reviewed for tasks to generate from an order (multistep order)

columns.name: NP_RELEASE_WS_ID
columns.description: The workstation in use when the next pass through an order rule for generating tasks was initiated
